text: Flirty Dancing is an American dance reality television series created for the Fox Broadcasting Company. Based on the Channel 4 version in the United Kingdom, it is produced by Second Star, which produces the original, and All3Media, and debuted on December 29, 2019. On May 18, 2020, the series was cancelled after one season. ==Premise== Jenna Dewan hosts the show which features single people going on blind dates and dancing to choreographed routines. ==Episodes== ==References== ==External Links== *Official Website Category:2010s American reality television series Category:2019 American television series debuts Category:2020 American television series endings Category:2020s American reality television series Category:English-language television shows Category:Fox Broadcasting Company original programming Category:American television series based on British television series Category:Television series by All3Media Category:Dance competition television shows
title: Flirty Dancing
